items.title: Fun Fact
items.description: Did you know? Turkish has over 1,700 English loanwords, yet requires phonetic mapping for accurate translation. [Learn more](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turkish_language)

items.title: Fun Fact
items.description: Intriguingly, Turkish uses a Subject-Object-Verb order, requiring MT engines to reorder sentences entirely for accuracy. [Discover more](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Turkish_grammar)
